entry.data:
SUNNY, BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH RAIN
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
